TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PropertyValueOrigin extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the level in the configuration hierarchy where a configuration property value originated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The configuration property value originates from the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty.DefaultValue%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin Inherited = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The configuration property value is inherited from a parent level in the configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin SetHere = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The configuration property value is defined at the current level of the hierarchy.
